name: Mandi Price Tracker
short_description: Check real-time crop prices from local mandis across UP. Set price alerts and track weekly trends.
pain_point: Farmers often sell at low prices due to lack of market information
opportunity: Access to price data can help farmers get 10-15% better prices
target_users: All farmers selling produce in UP mandis
technical_approach: Simulated real-time price data with district-wise variations
